name: MonsterMatch!
description:
Oh no! It seems like your luck has finally run out. Your mom won't stop pressuring you about finding a date to your sister's wedding! With only one week left before the ceremony, Mom's threats are seeming more and more real  by the day... 

But how could it be possible to find yourself a date in such a short period of time? There's really only one option for you...

You have to re-download MonsterMatch!

Play as an unwilling monster that is forced to navigate the online dating scene again. You will be able to text message and date 3 possible love interests: 

Britney, the ever so bubby zombie.

Slime Shadey, the aspiring SoundClown rapper.

and Ebony Dark'ness, the enigmatic mystery.

Total playtime: 20 - 40 min depending on completion level.

Thank you for taking the time to check out my game! It's my first ever release and I'm honestly very happy with how it came out.  It was an intense struggle for sure... but I really hope you do enjoy!

I apologize ahead of time if you encounter any bugs,  I don't expect any, but I did start this project 4 days before the end of NanoRenO  so there wasn't as much time to bug test as I would like ; - ;
